sentences.sentence: Reverend Koval leads one of his first services in Turkey after the Russian Orthodox Church decided to defrock him last September following his prayer for peace in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But Reverend Koval replaced the word victory with peace. In February, Reverend Kordoshkin was suspended for three months in Madrid for his stance against the fighting.
